item.title: Regional Blocks and International Relations: Economic Groupings or Political Hegemons?
item.description: Tovias, Alfred. “Regional Blocks and International Relations: Economic Groupings or Political Hegemons?.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 321-342. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Global governance; Regionalism; International Relations Text access (external link)
